@nixxin @kushanmitra @sruthijith What would you say
@nixxin @kushanmitra @sruthijith If I were to ask you if you were working on a particular story with the intention of blogging about it?
@nixxin @kushanmitra @sruthijith Quite honestly I would have done what Deep did
@sruthijith @kushanmitra @nixxin And the moment a private company says it is in the silent period it definitely means there is something
@sruthijith @kushanmitra @nixxin A No comment signifies there is probably  something. A denial says there is nothing
@sruthijith @kushanmitra @nixxin The moment Deep said that he cannot talk because it was a silent period the news would leak
@Javed_Del @nixxin @kushanmitra You may be upset. Companies will do what is required. No leaks in the silent period
@nixxin I dont think any company is going to jeapordise an IPO by putting out any kind of response that causes a premature leak
@Javed_Del @kushanmitra @nixxin the problem with "no comment" is that it signifies that there is something there else we would be denying it
